execution_plan.description: Find customer_ids that have placed more than 2 orders and have purchased at least 3 order items. Aggregation is performed in the orders database by joining Orders with Order_Items.
execution_plan.query: SELECT o.customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT o.order_id) AS orders_count, COUNT(oi.order_item_id) AS items_count FROM Orders AS o JOIN Order_Items AS oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id GROUP BY o.customer_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT o.order_id) > 2 AND COUNT(oi.order_item_id) >= 3;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve id, first name and last name for the customers identified in step 1 from the users database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id, customer_first_name, customer_last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN ($step1.customer_id);
